text: The pasta was excellent and the service was very attentive.
The atmosphere was romantic but the food was disappointing.
The pizza was decent and the wine selection was good.
We waited over an hour for our table despite having a reservation.
The staff was incredibly rude and the music was way too loud.
The dessert menu was extensive but the prices were reasonable.
I loved the cozy ambiance and the friendly waitstaff.
The restaurant was clean and well-maintained throughout.
Parking was convenient and the location was perfect.
The menu offered great variety for different dietary needs.
